About The Haughty Heron Bar & Package Store
The Best Beach Bar in Port St. Joe
Upscale down-home–The Haughty Heron is the gathering place where everyone’s a local!
Our upscale interior has a full bar and there are always sporting events on one of our 7 big screens. We offer craft cocktails, a complete line of liquors, fine wines, draft beer, and a wide selection of imported craft beers. The outdoor patio bar is a great place to relax with a fine cigar from our humidor and enjoy a sunset over St. Joseph Bay while listening to
live music
.
We are the party headquarters for any special occasion, offering assorted baskets with our
fine wines and spirits
. Are you
looking for a place to hold that special occasion
? The Haughty Heron can help you with that too.
We are located next to Port St. Joe Marina and within walking distance of the downtown district restaurants and the Piggly Wiggly Shopping Center. Come see for yourself why we were awarded a Certificate of Excellence by Trip Advisor and voted the best wine/liquor store and bar 2 years in a row!
Learn more about our:

Live Music & Events at the Haughty in Port St. Joe
Entertainment Indoors & Outdoors
If you’re looking for live music in Port St. Joe, there’s no better place to be than The Haughty Heron. We’re open 7 nights a week with lots of live music indoors and out.
Our upscale interior
is a great place to gather with locals and visitors to enjoy great music where we’ve hosted many Nashville songwriters who like to get away to Florida’s Forgotten Coast. Our outdoor patio beer garden has a full bandshell and bayside stage. There’s plenty of room to spread out and take in a stunning sunset in the background over St. Joseph Bay.
Why not make a weekend out of it?
Pick up a bottle of wine
and
rent our upstairs loft
.
Upcoming Events
Visit our Facebook page for dates & details on all events
